data.title: How many trophies has Tottenham Hotspur won? When was the last trophy they won?
data.meta_description:
Tottenham Hotspur were the talk of English football in the 1960's when they won the double in 1961.

Since then, Spurs have found trophies hard...
data.text:
Tottenham Hotspur were the talk of English football in the 1960's when they won the double in 1961.

Since then, Spurs have found trophies hard to come by but they still enjoy the odd bit of success in cup competitions.

Spurs' last trophy came in 2008 when they won the League Cup.

Here is a list of all the titles that Spurs have won since they were formed in 1882.

How many Premier Leagues have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the trophy twice, including as the First Division trophy.

Years : 1950–51, 1960–61

How many Championships have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the Championship trophy, when it was known as the second division, twice.

Years : 1919–20, 1949–50

How many FA Cups have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the FA Cup eight times.

Years : 1900–01, 1920–21, 1960–61, 1961–62, 1966–67, 1980–81, 1981–82, 1990–91

How many EFL Cups have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the EFL Cup, previously known as the League Cup, four times..

Years : 1970–71, 1972–73, 1998–99, 2007–08

How many Community Shields have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the Community Shield, previously known as the Charity Shield, seven times.

Years : 1921, 1951, 1961, 1962, 1967, 1981, 1991

How many UEFA European Cup Winners' Cups have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the Cup Winners' Cup, a now defunct European trophy, once.

Years : 1962-63

How many UEFA Europa Leagues have Spurs won?

Spurs have won the Europa League, previously the UEFA Cup, twice
